testsuite.name: FlashcardsTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #13
Your program should print the hardest card(s) if such card(s) exists
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit, log, hardest card, reset stats): > import File name: > capitals.txt 1 cards have been loaded. Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit, log, hardest card, reset stats): > import File name: > capitalsNew.txt 1 cards have been loaded. Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit, log, hardest card, reset stats): > hardest card There are no cards with errors. Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit, log, hardest card, reset stats):
